name: Chetan Valluru
summary: Data Scientist passionate about LLMs and AIML, committed to innovating with emerging technologies. I combine cutting-edge research with real-world applications to deliver data-driven solutions that drive business value.

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science
Bachelor’s degree in Electronics and Communications with Machine Learning and AI

projects.title: BetterLlama : Smaller and better LLM
projects.description: Distilled and fine-tuned Llama 3.2 with LoRa for enhanced local processing, efficiency, security, and privacy. Integrated chain-of-thought and prompting layer for everyday use, achieved cost and compute efficiency through 8-bit quantization. Built-in safeguards to block harmful queries for compliance and responsible AI.

projects.title: ChessGPT : Transformers Based Chess Engine
projects.description: Built an AI chess transformer model from scratch leveraging NLP and fine-tuned with LoRA, treating moves sequence as sentences and moves as words. Achieved a whopping 10% win / 69% draw rate against Stockfish.

projects.title: NJ Transit Smart Journey Assistant
projects.description: Developed a rail delay prediction pipeline using Random Forest, predictive maintenance algorithms, and an AI chatbot powered by Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) leveraging FAQ data. projected to reduce operational delays by 10%.

projects.title: Optimizing NYC Taxi Tips and Profits
projects.description: Regression analysis on NYC taxi data to identify key tipping factors, optimize driver profitability and increase tip prediction accuracy by 15%.

projects.title: Twitter Search: Hybrid DB
projects.description: Developed a hybrid database system using MongoDB and MySQL for efficient social media data storage and retrieval, enhancing query performance by 25%.

projects.title: Targeted Caravan Insurance Marketing Model
projects.description: Improved customer segmentation through A/B testing, increasing campaign effectiveness by 18%.

projects.title: Multi-Classification of Respiratory Diseases and GUI
projects.description: Fine-tuned ResNet50 for respiratory disease classification, achieving 95% accuracy and integrating results into a user-friendly GUI for medical practitioners.

projects.title: Automated Contactless Covid Alert System
projects.description: A contactless system with mask detection, thermometer integration, and automated sanitizer dispensing.

experience.title: Machine Learning & Statistics Grader
experience.description: Graded statistical inference, hypothesis testing and ML assignments, guided students in applying ML, statistical methods.

certificates.title: British Airways Data Science Virtual Internship
certificates.description: Analyzed customer reviews and built predictive models to identify buying patterns, improving marketing strategies by 20% which is a critical component of British Airways success

achievements: V. Chetan Reddy, V. Naveen Kumar, Y. Padma Sai, G. Spurthi and A. Mahesh, Multi-Classification of Respiratory Diseases using Deep Learning, 2023 International Conference on Sustainable Computing and Smart Systems (ICSCSS), Coimbatore, India, 2023, pp. 273-277, DOI: 10.1109/ICSCSS57650.2023.10169597 [AI/ML Domain]
First Place, HackRU Fall-2024 – NJ Transit Track — Hackathon at Rutgers University October 2024
Won GOLD in Global Youth Scientist Challenge
